text: Kenzaburō Ōe (born January 31, 1935 in Ehime; died March 3, 2023 aged 88Kyodo News, "Kenzaburō Ōe"; retrieved 2023-3-13.) was a Japanese writer and peace activist. He was the winner of the 1994 Nobel Prize in Literature.NobelPrize.org, "Kenzaburō Ōe"; retrieved 2012-9-17. ==Related pages == * List of Nobel Prize winners by country ==References== ==Other websites== * Ōe, Kenzaburō, 1935- at Virtual International Authority File (VIAF) Category:Japanese writers Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:People from Ehime Prefecture Category:Japanese Nobel Prize winners Category:University of Tokyo alumni
title: Kenzaburō Ōe
